passive.title: Burning Rhythm
passive.desc: Each swap Enfuego makes deals 4 damage for each swap he has made so far this turn.

coreSpell.title: Fiery Fandango
coreSpell.desc: Deal 30/50/80 damage to your opponent, force them to discard 0/1/2 hexes, and inflict 2/4/7 random tiles with burning. Deal 20 additional damage when consuming a fire match.

spell1.title: Baila!
spell1.desc: Both players draw two hexes. Perform a swap.

spell2.title: Incinerate
spell2.desc: Drag target up to 6 burning tiles, destroying them and dealing 35 damage for each destroyed.

spell3.title: Hot Potatoes
spell3.desc: Place a 3-turn debuff on your opponent that causes them to take 3 additional damage whenever they take damage for each tile in their hand.

signature.title: White-Hot Combination Kick
signature.desc: Destroy 3 tiles, dealing 70 damage for each tile destroyed. Any fire tiles destroyed this way inflict burning on 4 random adjacent tiles. Any muscle tiles destroyed this way cause your opponent to discard 1 hex.

passive.title: Zombie Lord
passive.desc: Each of The Gravekeeper’s Zombies can Attack a random adjacent non-Zombie tile. When Zombies Attack another tile they Zombify their victim. If their victim is a muscle tile, they will destroy it instead, healing The Gravekeeper for 15 health and dealing 15 damage to the opponent.

coreSpell.title: Business in the Front
coreSpell.desc: Deal 10/30/60 damage and Zombify 1/2/3 random tiles on the board. Zombify 1 extra random tile when consuming an earth match. Switch to Party in the Back.

altCoreSpell.title: Party in the Back
altCoreSpell.desc: Deal 20/50/90 damage. All Zombies in a 1x1/2x2/3x3 area Attack. Deal 20 extra damage when consuming a muscle match. Switch to Business in the Front.

spell1.title: The Oogie Boogie
spell1.desc: Distance swap any 2 Zombie tiles, then those Zombies attack.

spell2.title: Party Crashers
spell2.desc: Drop 2 tiles into the board. Each tile dropped deals 30 damage to the opponent and destroys the tile directly below it as it enters the board. Additionally, both enter the board as Zombie tiles.

spell3.title: Undead Union
spell3.desc: All Zombies deal 5 damage for each adjacent Zombie.

signature.title: Tombstone
signature.desc: Drop a Tombstone into target column, dealing 225 damage and destroying all tiles in that column on the way down. At the end of each turn, the Tombstone will spawn one Zombie earth or muscle tile directly above itself. The Tombstone cannot be moved from its place, is indestructible, and lasts 5 turns.
